title: Bug 49890 - Nio Selector issue on Linux platform
description:
Bug 49890 - Nio Selector issue on Linux platform

Created attachment 25997 - NioEndpoint.java and simple web application

Sometimes, the server's CPU reaches 100% and remains at 100% until restarted. This issue is reproduced with Java versions: 1.6.007, 1.6.018, 1.6.021. It appears to be a duplicate of issue Bug 46373. The Jetty team may have fixed a similar problem as seen in their ticket: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel.

I added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.
OB: With this logging, we can observe that sometimes the selector.select(timeout) method returns zero keys on the Linux platform.
